description: Haringey Council will guide the public around recently completed placemaking projects around Wood Green town centre, featuring the new Youth Hub, a new Community Cafe in a park and co-designed art murals and pocket parks

factsheet.heading: Placemaking
paragraphs: A walking tour to see a number of co-designed projects completed by Haringey Council by working with Wood Green's local community. Including community parklets, two large murals, a new cafe, and the award winning Rising Green Youth Hub.

images.title:
Matt Dosa‘s landmark community co-designed artwork ‘Under
Many Flags’ on Wood Green's Mall.

location.address: Outside Wood Green Underground Station, N22 8HH

name: Walking Tour of Wood Green Placemaking Projects
